typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(Column_2=='Pens',
	true(),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitCheckInvalidData@(ErrorRows, GoodRows)
ConditionalSplitCheckInvalidData@ErrorRows derive(FileName = 'SalesIND_2022_JAN_01.csv') ~> FileNameColumnErrorRows
ConditionalSplitCheckInvalidData@GoodRows derive(FileName = 'SalesIND_2022_JAN_01.csv') ~> FileNameColumnGoodRows
FileNameColumnErrorRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesDate as string,
		SalesItem as string,
		Country as string,
		Quantity as string,
		FileName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SalesDate = Column_1,
		SalesItem = Column_2,
		Country = Column_3,
		Quantity = Column_4
	)) ~> CopyBadRowstoBadTable
FileNameColumnGoodRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesDate as string,
		SalesItem as string,
		Country as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		FileName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		SalesDate = Column_1,
		SalesItem = Column_2,
		Country = Column_3,
		Quantity = Column_4
	)) ~> CopyGoodRowstoSuccessTbl
